parameters.name: BatchId
parameters.description: The ID of the release batch.

parameters.name: BatchName
parameters.description: The name of the release batch.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The interval between two release batches.

parameters.name: OperationBase
parameters.description:
The asset selection dimension. Valid values:

*   **0**: instance
*   **1**: machine group
*   **2**: VPC-based instance ID
